description: Be prepared for changeable weather with this 2.5-layer rain shell. High Coast Hydratic Jacket offers great functionality for everyday trips to school or work and is packable and breathable enough to also work well on the trail. It has a protective hood, and zippered ventilation openings in the sides. Made from recycled polyamide with a unique printed pattern on the inside.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Hydratic Jacket - Mens
